title: Broadcast Deep Dive
description: A list of unapproved parts found in FAA Enforcement Actions, FAA Unapproved Parts Notifications (UPN), FAA Cease and Desist Orders, FAA Notice to Airmen (NOTAMs), FAA National Program Tracking and Reporting System (NPTRS), FAA Flight Standards Complaints, NTSB Accident Database, NASA Aviation Safety Reporting System (ASRS), Government Accountability Office (GAO), Inspectors General, FOIAs, human sources, stakeholders, Congressional representatives, private repair shops, aviation specialty attorneys, Google searches, site surveys, interviews, and spreadsheets.
